original_text: Of the sons of Issachar after their families: of Tola, the family of the Tolaites: of Pua, the family of the Punites:
korean_text: 잇사갈 자손의 종족들은 이러하니 돌라에게서 난 돌라 종족과 부와에게서 난 부니 종족과

sentences.original_text: Of the sons of Issachar after their families:
of Tola, the family of the Tolaites:
of Pua, the family of the Punites:
